##This is my favorite vacation resort in Panama  The best part of the beach is shown in the rectangle.  It features the abandoned villa of the country's former dictator.

```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() 
my_map <- my_map %>% addMarkers(lat=8.3651, lng= -80.1263, popup="My Favorite Vacation Resort")
my_map <- my_map %>% addRectangles(lat1 = 8.3661, lng1 = -80.1163, lat2 = 8.362, lng2 = -80.1263)
my_map
```
